item.title: Top 5 Most Memorable ‘Love Island USA’ Season 7 Moments
item.description: From Nic and Huda’s “Mamacita” scene to Chris and Huda’s awkward finale date, here are some of the best and worst moments from the latest season of the hit Peacock reality series.

item.title: Kenny and Kaylor Hope ‘Love Island USA’ Fans “Can Relate to Us More” in ‘Beyond the Villa’
item.description: The Peacock spinoff follows fan-favorite season six Islanders as they navigate life and love outside the ‘Love Island USA’ Villa.
